data.name: Toy Soldiers: HD
data.detailed_description:
Re-enlist with Toy Soldiers HD and experience the award-winning XBLA hit updated for a whole new generation!

Command from above or take direct control below. Lead your foot soldiers, cavalry, tanks and planes to victory. Deploy an exciting arsenal of guns, gas, howitzers, mortars, troops, flamethrowers and vehicles to protect your Toybox in vintage WWI toy dioramas.

Toy Soldiers is a multi-genre action-strategy game in which players command antique WWI toy soldiers vying for control of the trench-filled diorama battlefields of Europe. The original classic has been overhauled and upgraded with new content, skins, gameplay, expanded game modes, improved controls and graphical upgrades. We’ve also included all the original DLC and a few new levels as well!

Amazing Shell-Cam


Take a ride and follow your shot right onto its target!

Man the Guns


Leap into your strategically placed units and take hands-on control.

Fierce Boss Battles


Remember: this is a war of attrition, do whatever it takes against huge enemy bosses.

Commandeer Machines of War


Think you can drive it better? Jump behind the wheel and drive (or fly) these classic machines of war yourself.

Miniaturized Mayhem


Intense battlefield action as these miniature models unleash mayhem on each other!

data.short_description: Command antique WWI Toy Soldiers in the trench-filled battlefields of Europe. Deploy an exciting arsenal of guns, artillery, flamethrowers, tanks and planes to defend your WWI toy dioramas.  Take direct control of individual units or command the entire battlefield from above.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win XP (Service Pack 3)
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Dedicated Graphics Card with Shared Model 3.0 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD FX 8370
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
